description.name: swaps
description.tagline: Instant Approval High Risk Merchant Gateway (swaps.app)
description.long: Instant approval High Risk Merchant Gateway with instant payouts to your USDT Polygon wallet using swaps.app infrastructure
features: Accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa and Mastercard directly on your site
Instant payouts to your USDT Polygon wallet
ZERO Chargebacks all payments are final.
